citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:15 pm on 19-SEP-
2023. The inspector spoke to a Facility Representative who stated they were not available for inspection that day.
End Section

narrative:

Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.

2023. The inspector spoke to a Facility Representative who stated they were not available for inspection that day. 
 
 
End Section
